subject: Career
title: Your Network Is Not Your Followers
description: A fast breakdown of Your Network Is Not Your Followers for builders.

hook.text: 100K Twitter followers and nobody replies when you need help. Followers aren't a network.

buildup.text: A network is bidirectional: people who would help you and whom you would help. Followers are an audience.

discovery.text: The test: if you lost your job tomorrow, who would you call? That list is your real network.

twist.text: Some people with 200 followers have stronger networks than influencers with 200K.

climax.text: Build both â€” an audience for visibility, a network for resilience. Know which is which.

punchline.text: Followers watch you. Networks catch you.

quiz.question: What distinguishes a real network from followers?
